CustomField.description: The character code identifying the power region the ESI ID is electrically connected in as assigned by the TDSP (ERCOT, SPP, SERC, WSCC).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The character code identifying the power region the ESI ID is electrically connected in as assigned by the TDSP (ERCOT, SPP, SERC, WSCC).
CustomField.label: Power Region
